Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Diploma \Di*plo"ma\, n.; pl. {Diplomas}. [L., fr. Gr. ?, fr. ? to double, fr. diplo`os twofold. See {Double}.] A letter or writing, usually under seal, conferring some privilege, honor, or power; a document bearing record of a degree conferred by a literary society or educational institution. [1913 Webster]
diploma n : a document certifying the successful completion of a course of study [syn: {sheepskin}]
